titles: Hymenaei: or The solemnities of masque, and barriers magnificently performed on the eleventh, and twelfth nights, from Christmas; at court: to the auspicious celebrating of the marriage-vnion, betweene Robert, Earle of Essex, and the Lady Frances, second daughter to the most noble Earle of Suffolke. By Ben: Ionson.
author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.
publisher: Printed by Valentine Sims for Thomas Thorp,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
